<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Animations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Animates a door on a vehicle. Animation is defined in config file in [[CfgVehicles]] -> [[Model_Config#AnimationSources| AnimationSources]]. Wanted animation phase is set with phase param. This command works only on animation sources with "door" controller. Door_L in the example below can be animated with [[animateDoor]] but not CargoRamp_Open: <tt>heli [[animateDoor]] ["Door_L", 1];</tt><br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> [[animateDoor]] <tt>phase</tt> param will be rounded: anything >0.5 will be rounded to 1 and <<template><title>=</title></template>0.5 will be rounded to 0. Therefore it is not possible to open a door half way with this command</value></part></template>  <br>
<ext><name>syntaxhighlight</name><attr> lang="cpp"</attr><inner>
class AnimationSources
{
	class CargoRamp_Open
	{
		source = "user";
		animPeriod = 5;
		initPhase = 0;
	};
	class Door_L
	{
		source = "door";
		animPeriod = 1.6;
	};
};</inner><close></syntaxhighlight></close></ext>
To animate doors or other sources that have "user" controller, use [[animate]] command, or even better, [[animateSource]] (recommended). Sources with "hit" controller can be animated with [[setHitPointDamage]] command applied to the name contained in hitpoint property. For availability of animation sources and their controller types see: [[Arma 3: createVehicle/vehicles]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''animateDoor''' [doorname, phase, instant]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [doorname, phase, instant]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> doorname: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> phase: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> instant: [[Boolean]] (When [[true]] and phase is either 0 or 1, door will change phase instantaneously)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>Taru [[animateDoor]] ["Door_1_source", 1];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Open left front door on Ifrit instantly:<code>Ifrit [[animateDoor]] ["Door_LF", 1, [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[doorPhase]], [[setFaceAnimation]], [[animate]], [[animationPhase]], [[animateSource]], [[animationSourcePhase]], [[animationNames]]
</value></part></template></root>
